channel.title: Adventure – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Tap Skaters Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Tap Skaters Online is a puzzle game. Step on your skateboard, start your journey, challenge your eyesight and hand speed, quickly descend to the next level before encountering obstacles, and perfectly avoid each obstacle. Challenge your highest score! Have fun!Use the mouse or your finger to play.
item.content:encoded:
Tap Skaters Online is a puzzle game. Step on your skateboard, start your journey, challenge your eyesight and hand speed, quickly descend to the next level before encountering obstacles, and perfectly avoid each obstacle. Challenge your highest score! Have fun!
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Fruity Snake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Welcome in Fruity Snake. Play with the little snake in the funny Html 5 game. Make your snake as long as possible. The more fruits you collect, the more points you get. Tap on screen to move. Enjoy!Tap or mouse click to play.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome in Fruity Snake. Play with the little snake in the funny Html 5 game. Make your snake as long as possible. The more fruits you collect, the more points you get. Tap on screen to move. Enjoy!
Tap or mouse click to play.

item.title: Monkey Banana Jump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!Tap or click arrow key to play.
item.content:encoded:
This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!
Tap or click arrow key to play.

item.title: My Little Universe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: My Little Universe is an idle adventure game with 3D models. You can control a stickman warrior to discover the whole universe by collecting resources and unlocking new areas. When you step on the white lighting areas, you will know the resource request of the next area. Get close to any items to collect them […]
item.content:encoded:
My Little Universe is an idle adventure game with 3D models. You can control a stickman warrior to discover the whole universe by collecting resources and unlocking new areas. When you step on the white lighting areas, you will know the resource request of the next area. Get close to any items to collect them automatically.
On PC and MobileDrag the wheel = move

item.title: Extreme Road Trip
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Extreme Road Trip is a 2D cartoon vehicle game. After completing the beginner guidance, you will know how to control the vehicle and develop your garage. It is time to enjoy all challenges and levels for your records. Even the 2D platform will test your driving skills and balance abilities!On PCA or Left arrow = […]
item.content:encoded:
Extreme Road Trip is a 2D cartoon vehicle game. After completing the beginner guidance, you will know how to control the vehicle and develop your garage. It is time to enjoy all challenges and levels for your records. Even the 2D platform will test your driving skills and balance abilities!
On PCA or Left arrow = brakeD or Right arrow = gasOn MobileTap on the 2 buttons on the screen
